IES-PIRT Proseminar Series - IESPIRT - Institute of Human Development and Social Change - NYU Steinhardt                                                                           NYU       Institute of Human Development and Social Change                                IES-PIRT Proseminar Series                                                IES-PIRT Proseminar Series       Current Proseminar Series    Past Proseminar Series                           The Institute for Education Sciences-funded Predoctoral Interdisciplinary Research Training (IES-PIRT) program is an interdisciplinary fellowship program designed to train students of diverse backgrounds to become outstanding researchers in the educational sciences. In addition to funding doctoral students from the six affiliated departments across NYU (Steinhardt/Applied Psychology, Teaching and Learning, Humanities and the Social Sciences, and the Institute for Education and Social Policy; GSAS/Economics and Sociology; and the Wagner School of Public Service) the program includes a proseminar series. The series brings together presentations by both NYU and external experts who will help to introduce, reintroduce, and consolidate students' advanced understanding of the concepts of internal, external, construct, and statistical validity.    The proseminars are held on Mondays from 12:00-1:20PM during the academic year. Events - Institute of Human Development and Social Change - NYU Steinhardt                                                                           NYU       Institute of Human Development and Social Change                                Events                                                        The Institute hosts two speaker series with the goal of promoting intellectual community across NYU units strengthening interdisciplinary networks and collaborations with NYU faculty, students, and research staff. The IHDSC Seminar Series, which is held on Tuesdays (Wednesdays for co-sponsored talks), invites nationally prominent scholars to speak on their research and meet with NYU faculty and students. The IES-PIRT Proseminar Series, which is held on Mondays, allows IES-PIRT doctoral fellows to meet with outside lecturers as well as present their own research to a group of peers and colleagues.    In addition, IHDSC also sponsors annual conferences organized by faculty affiliates.
